sig_info: An excellent leader, Captain America learns from his teammates gaining a unique effect, while Kinetically Charged, for each class represented on his team, excluding himself.
Mutant: 40 to 100% chance on triggering a Special Attack to gain +1 Kinetic Potential.
Skill: 40 to 100% chance whenever a Debuff is gained, Consume 1 Kinetic Potential to Purify it.
Science: 40 to 100% chance on a Well-Timed Block to place a 10% Weakness Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.
Mystic: 40 to 100% chance to gain 1 Kinetic Potential each time a Buff Expires or is Nullified on the Opponent.
Cosmic: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place an Armor Break Debuff on the Opponent, reducing their Armor by 177.78 for 10 seconds.
Tech: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place a 25% Petrify Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.
